There are two well-known modifications of Ca 2Nb 2O 7: one with monoclinic symmetry (space group P21) [ 8] and another one with orthorhombic symmetry (space group Cmcm) [ 9]. The orthorhombic calcium pyroniobate with cell parameters a = 3.849 Å, b = 26.460 Å, c = 5.490 Å has been synthesized for the present study.
